title: CheckLongUncommitted tick is missing
body:
## Bug Report

<!-- Thanks for your bug report! Don't worry if you can't fill out all the sections. -->

In raftstore v1, CheckLongUncommitted is disabled unexpectedly.

### What version of TiKV are you using?
<!-- You can run `tikv-server --version` -->

v7.0.0

### Steps to reproduce
<!-- If possible, provide a recipe for reproducing the error. A complete runnable program is good. -->

Just run tikv.

### What did you expect?

CheckLongUncommitted ticks.

### What did happened?

CheckLongUncommitted does not tick.
